title: Audio Research LS-2/S-200 pre/power amplifiers
tags: see below], and the only extra here – apart from a very functional metal-bodied remote handset [see below] – is a USB-A port designated for service access. The preamp uses one triode per channel in its gain stage, driving the RCA outs directly and the balanced XLRs via a J-FET buffer – here the LS-2 is a tube/solid-state hybrid. Using either the fascia volume control or the up/down buttons on the remote reveals the clicking relays of the unit’s resistor-ladder volume control [[see Lab Report];[see Lab Report]
